00027 template <typename _ExtIterator,typename _UnaryFunction>
00028 _UnaryFunction for_each(_ExtIterator _begin, _ExtIterator _end, _UnaryFunction _functor,int nbuffers)
00029 {
00030         typedef buf_istream<typename _ExtIterator::block_type,typename _ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator> buf_istream_type;
00031         typedef buf_ostream<typename _ExtIterator::block_type,typename _ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator> buf_ostream_type;
00032         
00033         _begin.flush(); // flush container
00034         
00035         // create prefetching stream, 
00036         buf_istream_type in(_begin.bid(),_end.bid() + ((_end.block_offset())?1:0),nbuffers/2); 
00037         // create buffered write stream for blocks
00038         buf_ostream_type out(_begin.bid(),nbuffers/2); 
00039         // REMARK: these two streams do I/O while
00040         //         _functor is being computed (overlapping for free)
00041         
00042         _ExtIterator _cur = _begin - _begin.block_offset();
00043         
00044         // leave part of the block before _begin untouched (e.g. copy)
00045         for( ;_cur != _begin;_cur++)
00046         {
00047                 typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00048                 in >> tmp;
00049                 out << tmp;
00050         }
00051         
00052         // apply _functor to the range [_begin,_end)
00053         for( ;_cur != _end;_cur++)
00054         {
00055                 typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00056                 in >> tmp;
00057                 _functor(tmp);
00058                 out << tmp;
00059         }
00060         
00061         // leave part of the block after _end untouched
00062         if(_end.block_offset())
00063         {
00064                 _ExtIterator _last_block_end = _end - _end.block_offset() + _ExtIterator::block_type::size;
00065                 for( ;_cur != _last_block_end; _cur++)
00066                 {
00067                         typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00068                         in >> tmp;
00069                         out << tmp;
00070                 }
00071         }       
00072         
00073         return _functor;
00074 }
00075 
00084 template <typename _ExtIterator,typename _EqualityComparable>
00085 _ExtIterator find(_ExtIterator _begin, _ExtIterator _end, const _EqualityComparable & _value,int nbuffers)
00086 {
00087         typedef buf_istream<typename _ExtIterator::block_type,typename _ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator> buf_istream_type;
00088         
00089         _begin.flush(); // flush container
00090         
00091         // create prefetching stream, 
00092         buf_istream_type in(_begin.bid(),_end.bid() + ((_end.block_offset())?1:0),nbuffers); 
00093         
00094         _ExtIterator _cur = _begin - _begin.block_offset();
00095         
00096         // skip part of the block before _begin untouched
00097         for( ;_cur != _begin;_cur++)
00098                 in++;
00099         
00100         // search in the the range [_begin,_end)
00101         for( ;_cur != _end;_cur++)
00102         {
00103                 typename _ExtIterator::value_type tmp;
00104                 in >> tmp;
00105                 if(tmp == _value)
00106                         return _cur;
00107         }
00108         
00109         return _cur;
00110 }
